channel.title: Haloween event!
channel.description:
http://news.runescape.com/newsitem.ws?id=1464
It seems like the events keep getting stupider and stupider. The reward is basically the chicken costume changed colors.
I only play rs for more than 15 mins 3 times each year, Easter, Christmas, and Halloween. I wasted my time on this one.

item.title: Haloween event!
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

What’s even more retarded is that it comes with emotes. Jagex should learn to revive their economy. Rares were the heart of the whole economy.

Read full topic

What item do you get for the Halloween quest?

item.title: Haloween event!
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:21, topic:239710”][quote author=dogs with guns link=topic=316003.msg2516441#msg2516441 date=1225637584]
90% of my bank is now holiday items
It would be nice if they gave us more than 68spaces more like 100…
[/quote]
You can drop them and then get them back from diango in draynor, or whoever. It’s also possible to build chests or closets in your house to store holiday costumes.

I logged in today to do the event, as I began it I said “Now to do this event and log out for another 3 months” and nearly all the other people who were doing it with me said “yeah same.”[/quote]

Well he is obviously F2P so he doesn’t have a house.

Read full topic

item.title: Haloween event!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“dogs with guns, post:20, topic:239710”]90% of my bank is now holiday items
It would be nice if they gave us more than 68spaces more like 100…[/quote]
You can drop them and then get them back from diango in draynor, or whoever. It’s also possible to build chests or closets in your house to store holiday costumes.

I logged in today to do the event, as I began it I said “Now to do this event and log out for another 3 months” and nearly all the other people who were doing it with me said “yeah same.”

Read full topic

item.title: Haloween event!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Hey, at least we got brooms … oh wait, they probably just want the players to clean up the mess that Jagex has made themselves! Those dirty bastards. -_-

Anyways, I think the cloak and emote are cool. The little addition of being able to get a purple cat is pretty cool too. Other than that, yeah it’s crap. I know for a fact that the Christmas event will be fail also because what’s the point of having a santa suite, without the hat? I don’t feel like wasting some millions on a stupid hat that has no true use just to have a full outfit. The Christmas event’s plot seems like it’d be fun though.

Read full topic

item.title: Haloween event!
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

“Andrew, do you have plans for th upcoming event?”
“What event?”
“Halloween, sir.”
“ofuk, just recolor a set and give them a bat emote, should calm the lil’ shits.”
“Alright… sir… erm”

Read full topic
